title: Several dead after multiple blasts hit Afghanistan
text:
Several dead after multiple blasts hit Afghanistan 5:02pm BST - 00:47
Afghan security forces battled for hours against a group of attackers who stormed a government building in the eastern city of Jalalabad on Sunday after a coordinated assault that killed at least 15 people and wounded 42, local officials said. Rough cut (no reporter narration).
